scripts.test: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const {execSync}=require('child_process');const required=fs.readFileSync('.hugo_version','utf8').trim();const installed=execSync('hugo version').toString().match(/v[\d.]+/)[0].slice(1);if (required === installed) { console.log(`Installed Hugo version ${installed} is OK.`); } else throw new Error(`Installed Hugo version mismatch: required ${required}, but found ${installed}`);"
